text: Pol takaw ne ak agek, mani tap okok dɨpun ak wakaj sakɨl, binɨb okok chɨnop takaw tɨmel agɨnɨgabal agak. Pen adek anɨb anep ma agebin, binɨb kɨli bin awl chɨn Atemis nop agnopun ak kelɨgɨl, kal awl nop agnepal ak kelɨgɨl gebal agɨl agebin agak. Ned Esiya plopens binɨb mɨdupsek ayɨp, binɨb lum awl mɨdupsek ayɨp, kɨli binawl anɨb ak nop agnepal agak. Pol takaw ne ak pen bin Atemis yɨb nop ag we gɨnɨgab agak.
